message:
探子來報：2015/11/14-16 將在比利時布魯塞爾舉行的 OpenCon2015 台北時間 6/23 14:59 ( June 22nd at 11:59pm PDT) 截止報名 (!!) 

對象：對開放文化/資料/教育有興趣的學生、青年學者與專業人士。申請還有可能獲得旅費資助。報名表單不長，有興趣敬請把握最後20多小時！
story: Hsiao-wei Chiu shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Applications to attend OpenCon 2015 on November 14-16 in Brussels, Belgium are now open! The application is available on the OpenCon website at opencon2015.org/attend and includes the opportunity to apply for a travel scholarship to cover the cost of travel and accommodations. Applications will clos…
name: OpenCon 2015 Applications are Open! | OpenCon 2015
